document.full_text: thousands of people fled their homes along the pacific coast of north and south america on friday as a tsunami triggered by japan's massive earthquake reached the region but spared it from major damage.
document.title: tsunami grazes americas but impact slight
lines_and_colors: thousands of people fled their homes along the pacific coast of north and south america on friday as a tsunami triggered by japan's massive earthquake reached the region but spared it from major damage.
